data.title: Wier's Mortuary Chapel
data.meta_description: Wier's Mortuary Chapel provides funeral, memorial, personalization, aftercare, pre-planning and cremation services in Crescent City, CA.
data.text:
Because You Are Our Family...

Wier's Mortuary Chapel and Crematoruim has a legacy of helping our community since 1947. We are a family-owned and operated funeral service provider offering dedicated and respectful care for all people in their time of need. This commitment to service remains the key element in Wier's desire to provide caring services for your family.

You, our family, are the most important part of our business. With that thought in mind if there are final arrangement needs that you would like to discuss, we will accommodate those needs. We take great pride in paying attention to every small detail allowing our grieving families to attend to larger and more important decisions at a time of death. Today's families have different views for services at a time of passing. We will help with traditional, cremation, memorial services, the receiving or forwarding of human remains and we can provide the state of the art in cemetery memorials. One phone call to our facilities will begin the process of fulfilling your requests. A full selection of quality caskets, outer burial containers, urns, memorial printing, granite or marble memorials are but a few of the merchandise items available to you at Wier's.

We do what we do because we care for you. You are a very important part of our community. Our establishment has been created with an atmosphere of peace and beauty. A comfortable, spacious facilitiy with well appointed art and quality furnishings. Beyond the calming atmosphere of our facilitiy,our staff has been instilled with the value of courteous and knowledgeable service. We are always happy to answer any questions you might have about Wier's and we encourage you to call or visit our facilitiy.

Our General Price List is available upon request and through the link below.

General Price List
